paragraphs.content: Chapter 6
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 6

paragraphs.content: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.

paragraphs.content: Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;)
paragraphs.contentHtml: Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;)

paragraphs.content: That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.

paragraphs.content: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Servants, be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Servants, be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;

paragraphs.content: Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;

paragraphs.content: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:
paragraphs.contentHtml: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:

paragraphs.content: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.

paragraphs.content: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.

paragraphs.content: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

paragraphs.content: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

paragraphs.content: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

paragraphs.content: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;

paragraphs.content: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;

paragraphs.content: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.

paragraphs.content: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

paragraphs.content: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

paragraphs.content: And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,

paragraphs.content: For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.

paragraphs.content: But that ye also may know my affairs, and how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:
paragraphs.contentHtml: But that ye also may know my affairs, and how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:

paragraphs.content: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and that he might comfort your hearts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and that he might comfort your hearts.

paragraphs.content: Peace be to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Peace be to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

paragraphs.content: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.
